bug.author: znation
bug.summary: Build warnings in visualization npm build
bug.description:
Repro steps: <denchmark-code>cd src/visualization/Turi Create Visualization/src/user_interface npm install npm run build </denchmark-code>
Expected: No warnings Actual: <denchmark-code>âžœ user_interface git:(master) npm run build
> user-interface@0.1.0 build /Users/zach/turicreate/src/visualization/Turi Create Visualization/src/user_interface > react-scripts build
Creating an optimized production build... Compiled with warnings.
./src/elements/Explore/Table/index.js Line 160: 'x' is already defined no-redeclare Line 168: 'x' is already defined no-redeclare Line 192: 'x' is already defined no-redeclare Line 200: 'x' is already defined no-redeclare Line 221: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq Line 264: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq Line 283: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq Line 308: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq Line 355: 'image_bounding' is already defined no-redeclare Line 356: 'image_bound_height' is already defined no-redeclare Line 358: 'header_positon' is already defined no-redeclare Line 359: 'header_top' is already defined no-redeclare Line 361: 'footer_position' is already defined no-redeclare Line 362: 'footer_top' is already defined no-redeclare Line 374: 'right_value' is already defined no-redeclare Line 375: 'right_image' is already defined no-redeclare Line 394: 'imageRow' is already defined no-redeclare Line 395: 'imageColumn' is already defined no-redeclare Line 441: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq Line 488: Expected '!==' and instead saw '!=' eqeqeq Line 499: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq Line 560: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq Line 575: 'x' is already defined no-redeclare Line 586: 'x' is already defined no-redeclare Line 604: Expected '!==' and instead saw '!=' eqeqeq Line 629: img elements must have an alt prop, either with meaningful text, or an empty string for decorative images jsx-a11y/alt-text Line 642: img elements must have an alt prop, either with meaningful text, or an empty string for decorative images jsx-a11y/alt-text Line 659: 'x' is already defined no-redeclare Line 673: Expected '===' and instead saw '==' eqeqeq

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link> Please assign this ticket to me as I would like to try fixing it and contribute .Thanks in advance!
